items.name: Example
items.room: put an int here instead of a string

items.name: The Philosophers sword
items.description: A powerful sword that was wielded by a great king from the kingdom of Rohan. This sword will deal damage of -15hp to any monster that comes across it.

items.name: The Queen’s Jewel
items.description: A rare gemstone from a dynasty of royalty. Putting this ring on will regenerate a player’s HP% Faster.

items.name: Sharks tooth
items.description: A tooth from the notorious megalodon. Equipping this gives a 10% boost to players damage

items.name: Sharks tooth
items.description: A tooth from the notorious megalodon. Equipping this gives a 10% boost to players damage

items.name: Ancient vase
items.description: King Tut’s favorite vase. It is rumored that whoever possesses it is doomed for eternity. Lowers players defense by 10% if equipped

items.name: Crystal skull
items.description: A crystal skull that was taken by Indiana Jones himself.

items.name: Aegis Shield
items.description: A magical shield that was once carried by the Greek god Zeus.

items.name: Ragnarok
items.description: A God-Slaying Divine sword fused from rage of the gods, capable of mass destruction. Equipping this sword allows the player to do -30 damage to an enemy.
